content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    vendor_id, pickup_datetime, sum(total_amount) "total_vendor_amount"
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://eliszdel7xj7vkkkkpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE   
    ) AS [result]
Group by vendor_id, pickup_datetime
order by pickup_datetime
